title: Imbalie - Results of AGM
content:
SENS Article 

  Shareholders are advised that, at the annual general meeting of Imbalie held on 18 September 2015, all the resolutions as set out in the notice of annual general meeting were passed by the requisite majority of votes. 
The number of shares voted in person or by proxy was 216 635 877 representing 62.69% of the total issued share capital of the same class of Imbalie.
